languages.text: "Значит, к исчезновению Крудараха причаст{mf|ен|на} не ты, а твоя семья?" {n}Ирлиэт поджимает тонкие губы.{/n} "Нет, я не стану обвинять тебя и твою кровь. Довольно. Мои обвинения уже стоили нам слишком многого".

"So you are not the one to blame for the destruction of Crudarach, but your blood is?" {n}Yrliet purses her thin lips.{/n} "No, I will not condemn you and your blood. No more. My accusations have already cost us too much."
languages.original_text: "Значит, к исчезновению Крудараха причаст{mf|ен|на} не ты, а твоя семья?" {n}Ирлиэт поджимает тонкие губы.{/n} "Нет, я не стану обвинять тебя и твою кровь. Довольно. Мои обвинения уже стоили нам слишком многого".

traits.locale_text: "So you are not the one to blame for the destruction of Crudarach, but your blood is?" {n}Yrliet purses her thin lips.{/n} "No, I won't condemn you and your blood. Enough of that. My accusations have already cost us too much."

"So you are not the one to blame for the destruction of Crudarach, but your blood is?" {n}Yrliet purses her thin lips.{/n} "No, I won't condemn you and your blood. Enough of that. My accusations have already cost us too much."

"So you are not the one to blame for the destruction of Crudarach, but your blood is?" {n}Yrliet purses her thin lips.{/n} "No, I will not condemn you and your blood. No more. My accusations have already cost us too much."

"So you are not the one to blame for the destruction of Crudarach, but your blood is?" {n}Yrliet purses her thin lips.{/n} "No, I will not condemn you and your blood. No more. My accusations have already cost us too much."

"So you are not the one to blame for the destruction of Crudarach, but your blood is?" {n}Yrliet purses her thin lips.{/n} "No, I will not condemn you and your blood. No more. My accusations have already cost us too much."

languages.text: “也就是说，导致克鲁达拉赫陨落的人并不是你，而是你的族人？”{n}伊莉耶特抿起薄唇。{/n}“不，我不会再责难你和你的族人，再也不会了。我先前的指控已经让我们付出了血淋淋的代价。”
languages.original_text: "So you are not the one to blame for the destruction of Crudarach, but your blood is?" {n}Yrliet purses her thin lips.{/n} "No, I will not condemn you and your blood. No more. My accusations have already cost us too much."

traits.locale_text: “也就是说，导致克鲁达拉赫陨落的人并不是你，而是你的族人？”{n}伊莉耶特抿起薄唇。{/n}“不，我不会再责难你和你的族人，再也不会了。我先前的指控已经让我们付出了血淋淋的代价。”

languages.text: «¿Entonces no debo culparte a ti de la destrucción de Crudarach, sino a tu linaje?». {n}Yrliet frunce sus delicados labios.{/n} «No, no os condenaré a tu linaje ni a ti. Ya no. Mis acusaciones ya nos han costado demasiado».
languages.original_text: "So you are not the one to blame for the destruction of Crudarach, but your blood is?" {n}Yrliet purses her thin lips.{/n} "No, I will not condemn you and your blood. No more. My accusations have already cost us too much."

traits.locale_text: «¿Entonces no debo culparte a ti de la destrucción de Crudarach, sino a tu linaje?». {n}Yrliet frunce sus delicados labios.{/n} «No, no os condenaré a tu linaje ni a ti. Ya no. Mis acusaciones ya nos han costado demasiado».

languages.text: « La destruction de Crudarach n'est donc pas de votre fait, mais de celui d'un membre de votre famille ? {n}demande-t-elle, puis elle pince les lèvres.{/n} Non, je ne vous condamnerai pas, vous et votre sang. Ça suffit. Mes accusations nous ont déjà tant coûté. »
languages.original_text: "So you are not the one to blame for the destruction of Crudarach, but your blood is?" {n}Yrliet purses her thin lips.{/n} "No, I will not condemn you and your blood. No more. My accusations have already cost us too much."

traits.locale_text: « La destruction de Crudarach n'est donc pas de votre fait, mais de celui d'un membre de votre famille ? {n}demande-t-elle, puis elle pince les lèvres.{/n} Non, je ne vous condamnerai pas, vous et votre sang. Ça suffit. Mes accusations nous ont déjà tant coûté. »

languages.text: "Dann trifft Euch also keine Schuld an der Vernichtung von Crudarach, aber Euer Blut schon?" {n}Yrliet schürzt die dünnen Lippen.{/n} "Nein, ich werde Euch und Euer Blut nicht verdammen. Schluss damit! Meine Anschuldigungen haben uns schon zu viel gekostet."
languages.original_text: "So you are not the one to blame for the destruction of Crudarach, but your blood is?" {n}Yrliet purses her thin lips.{/n} "No, I will not condemn you and your blood. No more. My accusations have already cost us too much."

traits.locale_text: "Dann trifft Euch also keine Schuld an der Vernichtung von Crudarach, aber Euer Blut schon?" {n}Yrliet schürzt die dünnen Lippen.{/n} "Nein, ich werde Euch und Euer Blut nicht verdammen. Schluss damit! Meine Anschuldigungen haben uns schon zu viel gekostet."

languages.text: 「クルダラの破壊を非難すべきはあなたではなく、あなたの血なのだな？」{n}ユリエットは薄い唇をすぼめる。{/n}「いや、あなたとあなたの血を非難するつもりはないんだ。もういい。私の告発はすでに多くの犠牲を払っている」
languages.original_text: "So you are not the one to blame for the destruction of Crudarach, but your blood is?" {n}Yrliet purses her thin lips.{/n} "No, I will not condemn you and your blood. No more. My accusations have already cost us too much."

traits.locale_text: 「クルダラの破壊を非難すべきはあなたではなく、あなたの血なのだな？」{n}ユリエットは薄い唇をすぼめる。{/n}「いや、あなたとあなたの血を非難するつもりはないんだ。もういい。私の告発はすでに多くの犠牲を払っている」

languages.text: "Yani Crudarach'ın yıkımından sorumlu olan sen değilsin ama senin kanından olanlar mı?" {n}Yrliet, ince dudaklarını sıkıyor.{/n} "Hayır, seni ve kanını artık suçlamayacağım. Suçlamalarım birçok şeye mal oldu zaten."
languages.original_text: "So you are not the one to blame for the destruction of Crudarach, but your blood is?" {n}Yrliet purses her thin lips.{/n} "No, I will not condemn you and your blood. No more. My accusations have already cost us too much."

traits.locale_text: "Yani Crudarach'ın yıkımından sorumlu olan sen değilsin ama senin kanından olanlar mı?" {n}Yrliet, ince dudaklarını sıkıyor.{/n} "Hayır, seni ve kanını artık suçlamayacağım. Suçlamalarım birçok şeye mal oldu zaten."
